15.content: How about Spirit Albarn and some double gains.
15.title: More

152.content:
It was a quiet morning in Death City. Was. "I AM BLACK*STAR, THE GREATEST ASSASSIN IN THE WORLD!! BOW DOWN TO ME!!" Tsubaki looked at her partner in embarrassment. "Black*Star, not everyone here gets up at 7 am. Quiet down and let them sleep." Black*Star just grinned at her.

2 hours later*************************************************************************** **********************

"Hey Soul!" called out Black*Star. "Get over here, Tsubaki made a great breakfast!" Soul perked up. "Breakfast?! Great I'm starving!" Maka stared at him. "But you just ate!" Soul ignored her, and rushed to the picnic table where Black*Star was eating. Boys! When they aren't cheating on you, they're stuffing their faces! A loud belch brought her back to reality. Tsubaki had a mortified expression on her face, and the red face of Black Star told her exactly who burped. "MAKA CHOP!!!" Black Star screamed in pain as a 700 page hardcover book slammed down on his head. "What was that for?"
Maka glared at him.
"You make it so hard to go out in public without being embarrassed!!!"
But Black Star had stopped paying attention and resumed shoveling food into his mouth. Maka sighed. There was no stopping those two.
Soul had eaten three heaping plates of hashbrowns, eggs, and toast, and was already eating another. Black Star had eaten 5 plates, and was halfway through his 6th. Jeez, they're going to make themselves puke, thought Maka.

A half hour later*************************************************************************** ******************************************************

"Boy, I am stuffed!" Black Star half grinned. Soul just hiccuped in agreement. Both boys looked absolutely stuffed, stomachs bloated out a little. They had eaten all of the food Tsubaki had made, then leaned back to rub their bellies. Maka was beyond embarrassed with Soul, whose shirt exposed a little of his gut. Soul then....
152.title: Soul and Black*Star

info.brief_description: Make the guys from the anime Soul Eater chubby! Just a feeewww things.
info.description:
1. No female weight gain (females can help the males gain)
2. No "He woke up and he was suddenly 90000000000 pounds
3. Keep the gains realistic
4. No magic gain (It ruins the fun!! :D)
5. Please no sex (imagine this being aired on Cartoon Network)
Okay start writing!!!
